atc:instruction.atc:text: Please wait for the next trial to start.
Press the [SPACE] key to begin training.

This is the end of the training. Please inform the experimenter.

Press the [SPACE] key to continue

atc:reminderBox.atc:displayText: Caution: Altitude changing! /nOnce cruising resolve /nimpending conflict with C63
Press Left Arrow Key /n when handing off C33
